xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/250597-Billy Joel: A Matter of Trust - The Bridge to Russia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sjIRcG2DNRZOCsXiztfrBK99xbH.jpg 26 years ago, Billy Joel took his family, his music and his concert show to the former Soviet Union. This feature-length documentary film looks back at the triumphs and difficulties encountered in creating the first fully staged rock 'n' roll show in the USSR. Directed by Emmy(R)-winning documentarian, Jim Brown. Billy Joel: A Matter of Trust - The Bridge to Russia
